blogPost.excerpt: Gravity is a sales intelligence platform helping individuals leverage triggering events that signal when to reach out to prospects. These events include when a prospect changes a job, when a company receives funding or when a company is growing quickly.
blogPost.body: Gravity is a sales intelligence platform helping individuals leverage triggering events that signal when to reach out to prospects. These events include when a prospect changes a job, when a company receives funding or when a company is growing quickly.
blogPost.title: Gravity - Reach out to prospects at the right time, every time
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Gravity是一个销售智能平台，帮助个人利用触发事件，提示何时与潜在客户联系。这些事件包括当潜在客户更换工作时，当公司获得资金时，或者当公司快速发展时。
localize.tagline: 每次都能在正确的时间与潜在客户取得联系

localize.description: Gravity是一個銷售智能平臺，幫助個人利用觸發事件，提示何時與潛在客戶聯繫。這些事件包括當潛在客戶更換工作時，當公司獲得資金時，或者當公司快速發展時。
localize.tagline: 每次都能在正確的時間與潛在客戶取得聯繫

previous.excerpt: Hypernotes is a knowledge management app with bi-directional linking, outlining, and super-powered collaboration features.
previous.title: Hypernotes - Create, share, and understand knowledge in a new way

localize.description: Hypernotes是一款具有双向链接、勾画和超强协作功能的知识管理应用。
localize.tagline: 以新的方式创造、分享和理解知识。

localize.description: Hypernotes是一款具有雙向鏈接、勾畫和超強協作功能的知識管理應用。
localize.tagline: 以新的方式創造、分享和理解知識。

next.excerpt: Twiso is a tool that helps you personalize your clubhouse invite page with a click of a button. You can use 3 custom eye-catching templates to unleash uniqueness and grow your audience.
next.title: Twiso - Personalize Clubhouse invite page with the click of a button

localize.description: Twiso是一款帮助你个性化会所邀请页面的工具，只需点击一个按钮即可。你可以使用3个自定义的醒目模板来释放独特性，增加你的受众。
localize.tagline: 只需点击一个按钮，就能实现个性化的会所邀请页面。

localize.description: Twiso是一款幫助你個性化會所邀請頁面的工具，只需點擊一個按鈕即可。你可以使用3個自定義的醒目模板來釋放獨特性，增加你的受衆。
localize.tagline: 只需點擊一個按鈕，就能實現個性化的會所邀請頁面。
